simj

Class SimSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimSimulation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fabrique, SuperMarche

    public abstract class SimSimulation
extends Object
    This class manages the simulation event loop, and provides features for initializing the simulation (that is, creating and providing the unique scheduler and randomizer, creating and registering resources, setting the simulation end time,...). The final event time and the creation of resources depend on the given simulation. These tasks are thus deferred.
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

    • Field Detail

      • instance

        protected static SimSimulation instance
        Like in singleton classes, this is the instance of this class. Since this class is abstract, this field has protected visibility, to allow implementing subclaccess to access it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimSimulation

        protected SimSimulation(double pFinalEventTime,
             int pScanInterval,
             boolean pFineLogging)
        Protected (to avoid external instantiation) constructor of the general simulation class.
        Parameters:
        pFinalEventTime - The
        pScanInterval - The interval between two "scan events" (SimEventScanResources).
        pFineLogging - A boolean determining if detailed logging is enabled (true) for this simulation or not (false).

    • Method Detail

      • createEvents

        protected abstract void createEvents()
        Creates the bootstrapping events of the simulation. This is a primitive operation and has to be implemented by subclasses.

      • createResources

        protected abstract void createResources()
        Creates the several resources of the simulation. This is a primitive operation and has to be implemented by subclasses.

      • getInstance

        public static SimSimulation getInstance()
        Returns the unique instance of this singleton class.
        Returns:
        The unique instance of this singleton class.

      • getNumberOfResources

        public int getNumberOfResources()
        Returns the number of resources of the simulation.
        Returns:
        The number of resources of the simulation.

      • getResource

        public SimResource getResource(int index)
        Returns the resource at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - An index into the resources of this simulation (between 1 and getNumberOfResources).
        Returns:
        The resource at the specified index.

      • registerResource

        void registerResource(SimResource pRes)
        Adds a resource to this simulation.
        Parameters:
        pRes - The resource to add to this simulation.

      • setupSimulation

        protected void setupSimulation()
        Does some additional simulation initialization configuration. This is a hook operation and may be overridden by subclasses. By default it does nothing.

      • startSimulation

        public final void startSimulation()
        Initializes and starts the simulation. This is a template method and calls several primitive and hook operations.
